#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Stop Feeling Like a Self

#Text=In many Eastern philosophies , it has been said that the cause of suffering in human beings is the Ego , also known as Ahamkara , Identity , character , etc. Desire and resistance are opposite forms of attachment , and the misperception of our true nature is connected to " feeling like a self . "
#Text=" Feeling like a self " translates to a term known as Asmita .
#Text=In order to access true , genuine happiness , it is suggested amongst many wise scholars that human beings end their idea of selfhood .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Acknowledge that you are a Self .
#Text=There is no way that we can solve our problems until we recognize that we have a problem .
#Text=So , it is best to first admit to your Self that sometimes you are feeling like a self .
#Text=Identify the characteristics of your Self .
#Text=What makes you feel like a Self ?
#Text=What are the qualities ?
#Text=Do you have interests ?
#Text=Things you do n't like ?
#Text=Do you experience sensations ?
#Text=Do you care about the past or future ?
#Text=Do you have positive or negative opinions about things ?
#Text=Do you have sight , hearing , taste , smell , feeling ?
#Text=All of these sensations are qualities of Feeling Like a Self .
#Text=Do you have labels that you attach to things ?
#Text=When you label something , you make it different from your Self with your mind .
#Text=So , it is like the backwards tricky way of feeling like a self .
#Text=It 's like being able to tell how you Do n't feel like a self .
#Text=If you make something Not you , then that means there is a You !
#Text=And identifying as You is the cause of suffering .
#Text=Renounce feeling like a Self .
#Text=Through breath control , aware movement , and decades upon decades of deep meditation , begin to end caring about your Self .
#Text=Think often upon the inner true nature of all things , and recognize that the qualities of all things are inherently the same , and there is no difference between you , me , or anybody else .
#Text=Slowly notice your desire and aversion to things , and over time , by noticing the many sensations you experience daily , begin to renounce your reactions to stimulus .
#Text=By actively engaging in this practice you will end " feeling like a self " and asmita will leave your experience .
#Text=This is known as " coalescence , " or a glittery shimmering purification of your consciousness that develops in pervading throughout all things , dissolving differentiation .
#Text=Practice .
#Text=Practice makes practice !
#Text=And the harder you try , the harder you will get better at it .
#Text=This is cited in many research articles and scholarly texts !
#Text=Never give up !
#Text=Tips
#Text=You are more likely to stop feeling like a self if you surround yourself with a community of people who are also actively working towards not feeling like a self !
#Text=You are also more likely to enjoy your experience on Earth , as feeling like a Self is said to be the root of all suffering .
